longinst: In this test, you need to draw the lines of the cube on the left in the space on the right. Your drawing should be exactly the same size and shape as the cube.  To make each line, start by clicking on a circle to start drawing, and then click on another circle to complete the line. If you make a mistake, you can delete lines using the delete button and start again. When you have drawn all of the parts of the cube, press OK to complete the test.  Click the mouse button to begin.
inst1: Copy the cube on the right EXACTLY in the grid below
inst2: Draw lines by clicking on start and end circle.
